item.title: Linux for Beginner
item.description:
If you’re new to Linux, this guide will help you get started with one of the most powerful and versatile operating systems out there. Linux runs everything from smartphones to supercomputers, and it’s known for its stability, security, and flexibility.

In this post, we’ll explore what Linux is, how it works, and introduce you to popular beginner-friendly distributions like Ubuntu or Linux Mint. You’ll also learn the basics of navigating Linux, both through its graphical interface and the command line, so you can confidently take your first steps into the Linux world.

item.title: Why Lua is good for beginners?
item.description:
Hello there! This is my first blog post about programming languages. Today’s topic is why you should learn Lua in 2025 and why it’s an excellent choice for beginners.

Introduction

If you haven’t heard of Lua, it’s a really small programming language. Maybe you have heard of it, but never had a reason to learn it because your preferred programming language already meets all your needs.

Lua is an open source language built on top of the C programming language. It is exclusively designed for embedded systems. It features dynamic typing, simple syntax and efficient memory management.
